subject: Baseball
Murders and Attempted Murders
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: Ugueth Urbina, who received a 14-year prison sentence after being accused of attacking workers at his family’s ranch in Venezuela in 2005, was released after serving five years.
snippet: Ugueth Urbina, who received a 14-year prison sentence after being accused of attacking workers at his family’s ranch in Venezuela in 2005, was released after serving five years.
